doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Siddiqur Rahman
doctor.degree: MBBS, DTCD, PhD (USA), FCCP (USA), ICTC (IUATLD), FWHO ( Tanzania)
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Siddiqur Rahman is a Chest Disease Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, DTCD, PhD (USA), FCCP (USA), ICTC (IUATLD), FWHO ( Tanzania). He is a Former Professor, Respiratory Medicine at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Rahat Anwar Hospital, Barisal.
